item.title: We’re living in ‘end times’ when you can’t retire on $1 million
item.description: Inflation is the dry rot that eats away at your dream home while you’re busy making retirement plans.

item.title: A U.S. strike on Iran wasn’t enough to rattle markets on Monday. Here’s what might change that.
item.description: From trade wars to the threat of an actual kinetic war, seemingly nothing has managed to keep stocks down for long this year.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.
